additional.title: Additional Settings
additional.description: Additional settings to enhance your experience.

preference.title: Preference Settings
preference.description: Preference tweaks or addons that apply on boot.

default.title: Default CPU Governor
default.desc: Governor that will be used on Normal profile

powersave.title: Powersave CPU Governor
powersave.desc: Governor that will be used on Powersave profile

limit.title: Limit CPU Freq
limit.desc: Set Max CPU Frequency in Balanced profile and ECO Mode

litemode.title: Lite Mode (Reboot to apply)
litemode.desc: Reduce Overheating by reducing CPU Frequency on Performance Profile

default.title: Default I/O Scheduler
default.desc: Scheduler that will be used on Normal profile

performance.title: Performance I/O Scheduler
performance.desc: Scheduler that will be used on Performance profile

powersave.title: Powersave I/O Scheduler
powersave.desc: Scheduler that will be used on Powersave profile

thanks.title: Thanks!âœ¨
thanks.message: Thanks for using AZenith! I really appreciate you for using AZenith. Without you, this module wouldn't be here today. AZenith will always be with you!

preference.title: Preference Settings
preference.description: Preference settings or addons that are applied on boot (requires reboot after changes).

schedtunes.title: Sched Tunes
schedtunes.desc: Optimize CPU frequency scaling for all CPU clusters by adjusting up/down rate limits (for schedutil and schedhorizon).

sfl.title: SurfaceFlinger Latency
sfl.desc: Tweak SurfaceFlinger to reduce screen latency and improve responsiveness.

jit.title: Just In Time
jit.desc: Improve application performance by enabling JIT compilation.

trace.title: Disable Trace
trace.desc: Disable kernel tracing and Android framework tracing.

fpsged.title: FPSGO and GED Parameter
fpsged.desc: Use optimized FPSGO and GED parameters.

logd.title: Kill Logger
logd.desc: Disable system logging services to reduce background activity and improve performance.

malisched.title: GPU Mali Scheduling
malisched.desc: Force the GPU to serialize job processing to improve predictability or reduce power usage in low-load conditions.

additional.title: Additional Settings
additional.description: Additional settings to enhance your experience.

gpreload.title: Game Preload
gpreload.description: Preload all required libraries when game starts to reduce load time and minimize lag.

memorykiller.title: Memory Killer
memorykiller.description: Kill all running apps in the background on Performance Profile.

apppriority.title: App Priority Control
apppriority.description: Increase CPU and I/O Scheduling Priority on Performance Profile.

bypasscharge.title: Bypass Charge
bypasscharge.description: Enable Bypass Charging in Performance Profile. Works on most MediaTek devices.

dnd.title: Do Not Disturb
dnd.description: Block all notifications on Performance Profile to enhance gaming experience.

vsync.title: Disable VSync
vsync.description: Disable synchronization between rendering frame rate and display refresh rate.

fstrim.title: FSTrim Partition
fstrim.description: Trim unused blocks in system partitions to optimize I/O performance and reduce storage overhead.

resolution.title: Underscale Resolution
resolution.description: Set device virtual resolution to a smaller size.

verbose.title: Enable Verbose Logging for AZenith
verbose.desc: Allow Verbose logging of AZenith (keep it disabled if you don't know what this is).

toast.title: Show Toast Notifications
toast.desc: Show toast notification when changing profiles.

disableai.title: Disable Dynamic Profile
disableai.desc: Disable switching profiles when opening games (skip performance profiles).

scheme.title: Color Scheme
scheme.description: Adjust screen saturation and RGB colors.

gamelist.title: Game List
gamelist.description: Any apps and games listed here will trigger the Game Profile.
